results.title: LIVE LAUGH LOVE Quote Canvas Print Positive Quote Home Wall Decor Modern Art Wood Sign Bedroom Quotes Art Gift For Her Wedding Gift Vintage
results.description:
Buy any 2 Canvas Prints from us and get 1 small (5x7" or 7x5") canvas print for FREE. 
In the "Note to seller" at the checkout page, write to us the title or send a link of canvas print you want to get for FREE.


IMPORTANT: When making a purchase from us, don't forget to leave your phone number as it's required by our UPS/DHL carriers for shipping.


   Canvas Details:

* It's ready to hang out of the box.
* Wooden wrap-resistant frame handcrafted by skilled artisans.
* Specially coated with poly-cot canvas for the highest durability and best color vibrancy.
* Archival grade canvas.
* Hand-laminated and handmade canvas prints.
* Hanging hardware is preinstalled.
* Made in United States.
* Designed In-House.
* Exclusive Designs.


Inspirational Wall Art. Wall Decor Canvas Art is produced on water resistant canvas with a UV-Resistant gloss coating and wrapped on a wood frame. Made in USA.


Our canvas prints are generally printed in 1-3 business days after proof is approved; delivery takes from 8 to 10 business days.

FREE Standard Shipping
Each order is printed on-demand. You can expect your order to get to you within 10-12 business days of purchase. We shipping to United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Canada and New Zealand. We use UPS and DHL to deliver all our goods - we offer the fastest "ORDER TO DELIVERY" time in the industry. We take pride in the fact that we have over 99.98% on-or before-time deliveries. 

 
Why choose us?

Every drawing is unique and cannot be bought anywhere else! All of the products on our store are exclusive to us, designed by us, and manufactured only for our online gallery. 


If you don't love it, send it back on our costs. You can return your canvas within 60 days from receipt of order.


Our canvas prints are the best option for decorating your home walls! When it needs a unique gift for someone, it's a perfect choice. We are here to remold your love, inspiration and positive life for high-end, UV-protected, waterproof quality cotton canvas. PomeloArt follows a very ethical pricing policy. There are no extra or hidden costs once you make a deal with PomeloArt.



RETURNS

PomeloArt believes in customer satisfaction. If you find any defect in our print, we will make it perfect for you. This includes any manufacturer's defects such as loose or wavy canvas, bubbles, scratches, or fading. If this occurs, we will either replace your canvas print or fix it at our cost.

We offer a 60 day return/exchange policy for our products. You can choose refund, exchange, or replacement if you are dissatisfied for any reason with your product.

When returning an item, it must be in all of the original packaging and include all of the original accessories or items that came with it. All returns MUST be done within 60 days of date of purchase. We cannot give refunds or replacements after the 60 day limit has expired.

When sending in a return, it can take up to 7 business days for the return to be processed. We do our best to process as quickly as possible. In the rare event of something out of the ordinary happens with our products or shipping, we will gladly work with you to find a solution.

results.title: Rustic Wedding Fabric Garland, Wedding Backdrop, Farmhouse Wedding Garland, Barn Wedding Garland, Bridal Shower Garland, Lace Garland
results.description:
Rustic wedding garland, wedding banner, wedding backdrop,farmhouse wedding garland, barn wedding banner, bridal shower garland.

Fabric garlands are the perfect compliment to any room or for any special occasion or event. The rustic wedding garland is sure to add a little shimmer and charm to your wedding, bridal shower or special event. 

The Rustic Wedding Fabric Garland features strips of fabric and lace in soft creams and white. The fabric strips vary in length and hang approximately 11 to 14 inches. Adorned with 3 strips of soft ribbon with the words live, love, laugh. The fabric portion of the garland measures approximately 3 feet wide with an extra 2 feet of jute twine on each side for hanging.

Please contact me with any questions. Thanks for looking!

results.title: Relax Refresh Reflect
results.description:
Relax Refresh Reflect is metal wall art.
Has a beautiful hammered black finish that look great in any home
Being 23" wide and 10" high  it will fit any wall in your home.
Is a stylish font that goes with any decor
The art is cut out of 14 gauge mild steel
Chemically processed and cleaned 
Paint with a hammered black finish that adds just the right textured finish.
The whole process is completed using 100 % solar power
All steel used by us is Remanent cutoffs purchased from the steel manufacturing industry.
Can be ordered in any size, several finishes and colors
Need a custom version? Just Click the 'ask a question" box and we"ll be happy to work with you

results.title: String Art Pattern - Live Laugh Love 10x10
results.description:
String Art Pattern & Instructions

Everyone can make their own STRING ART creation!  Becoming a string artist is easier than you think.  Simply choose a design pattern, hammer your nails into a board, and string as desired.  Just like that… you nailed it!  Create your own string art masterpiece to decorate your home.  String art projects make perfect handmade gifts and are super fun craft to make with friends.  Get started today with my easy-to-use templates with dots showing where to place every nail.  Just gather up a few supplies and you’ll be hooked on stringing.

This listing is for a downloadable digital pattern (PDF) with detailed instructions to create your own DIY string art project.  The instructions include a list of materials needed, instructions for using the pattern, and tips & techniques to help with your project.  All pages print on standard letter size paper (8-1/2”W x 11”H).  For larger projects, instructions are provided to seam pages together to create a large pattern.  Please double-check your pattern size selection before finalizing your purchase.

Pattern Name:  Live Laugh Love 10x10

Skill Level:  Advanced

Design Size:  10”H x 10”W

String Art Size:  9.64” H x 8.90” W

This is a TEMPLATE and INSTRUCTIONS only.  Materials are not included in this listing.  A suggested materials list is provided in the instructions.  This is for DIY projects, so you can choose whatever materials you like to use on your project and make it your own.  Looking for something that’s not in my shop?  Please contact me for a custom string art pattern.

The downloadable digital pattern includes a license for personal use only by the purchaser.  Please do not copy, sell, or distribute the pattern.  If you would like to use the pattern for a group project, please purchase the group license for a nominal fee.  If you are interested in using the pattern to sell your string art projects, then please contact the shop owner for a commercial license.

When you are buying from an artist/maker, you’re buying more than just an object.  You are buying hundreds of failures and experimentation.  You are buying days, weeks, and months of frustration and moments of pure joy.  You aren’t just buying a thing.  You’re buying a piece of heart, part of a soul, a moment of someone’s life.  Most importantly, you’re buying the artist more time to do something they are passionate about.  Thank you for supporting me on my creative journey.  If you have any questions or concerns, please contact me.

results.title: Memory Wire Bracelet, Beaded Bracelet, Inspirational Gifts, Iolite, Healing Crystal Bracelet
results.description:
Blue Crazy Lace Agate bracelet, Iolite gemstone bracelet, inspirational quote bracelet, memory wire bracelet, stacking bracelet, spiritual gifts for women, live your dream, live laugh love, beaded wrap bracelet, brave, follow your heart, life is short break the rules

This bohemian wrap bracelet is made with Iolite and Blue Crazy Lace Agate semi-precious gemstone chips. It is accented with silver spacer beads. It has a silver "Live laugh love" and "Live your dream" charms on each end. There is also a silver "Brave", "Follow your heart", "Blessed" and "Life is short, break the rules" charms.

Made from stainless steel memory wire, this stunning bracelet will keeps it's shape. This memory wire bracelet will fit an average 8 inch wrist. Wraps 4 times around, easy to put on and take off..

Additional information: 
* One of a kind piece
* Shades of blue and silver

***How to find me on SOCIAL MEDIA***
www.facebook.com/magickalmoonjewelry
www.instagram.com/magickalmoonjewelry
www.twitter.com/shericerrone
www.pinterest.com/shericerrone

***Visit my shop homepage for more items***
https://www.etsy.com/shop/SheriCerrone?ref=shopsection_shophome_leftnav

Magickal Moon Jewelry by Sheri Cerrone on Etsy offers unique handmade jewelry. Each piece is handmade by me using items such as semi-precious gemstones, glass and seed beads, stone pendants and metal charms. I offer a large assortment of necklaces, statement pieces, memory wire bracelets, chandelier earrings and more.

*Please note, color may vary on different computers. Also, each item can be altered, such as different color beads or a longer/shorter length. This would be a custom order and would be based on having the proper materials for the project. Please send a convo or email about a specific item.*

Listed below are some common meanings of gemstones. All information has been collected from various sources on the internet.

Iolite:
Helps to increase simplicity, imagery, truth and peace.
Color: Clear Bluish-Lavender

Blue Lace Agate:
A very calming stone, the colors are reminiscent of clouds. Helpful for freely expressing oneself, how one feels and thinks, aiding in personal growth. Provides a cool and soothing energy, which is good for neutralizing red energies such as anger, infections, inflammations, fevers etc. Also known to help open the throat chakra. This stone bestows calmness on the wearer, removing any anger or irritation in their presence.
Color: Clear Light Blue, Blue-Green

results.title: Live Laugh Love Charm | Inspirational Charm | Celebration Jewelry | Life Jewelry | Loving Life
results.description:

We have dozens of other love and heart charms located in this section of the shop:    https://www.etsy.com/shop/FoxiBelles?ref=l2-shop-header-avatar&section_id=18942484

Design your own charm bracelet, necklace or ankle bracelet!  This charm comes ready-to-wear with a 12mm lobster clasp attached (unless you choose "No Lobster Clasp" when you put it in your cart).  All you have to do is clip it on to  your favorite chain!  

We also sell charm chains in any length you want, please check out our shop at www.foxibelles.com and look under the "Chains and Cords" section.

Made of lead-free, nickel free Tibetan silver*, this charm is durable and affordable.  

We have HUNDREDS of charms that are not listed on our site.  If you're looking for something special, please message us here or e-mail foxi@foxibelles.com

These bracelets are the perfect addition to your jewelry collection or can be given as a unique customizable gift.  We pride ourselves on working with our customers to create the perfect piece of jewelry, as well as receiving five star reviews.  We look forward to working with you! 

Materials
This item is handmade with 100% Linhasita waxed polyester cord.  Linhasita makes the highest quality string that doesn’t fade, is washable, and completely waterproof.   Please be aware that other shops sell similar products, but are not created with the same high quality material.  

Charms

Colors
We offer a wide variety of colors for you to choose from.  Please include your color selections in the personalization section during checkout to insure your bracelet is made to your liking.

Sizing
We make every item customizable to your size preference, because one size does not fit everyone.  Therefore we offer a variety of sizes to give you the best fit and desired look.

results.title: Live Forever T Shirt, Live Laugh Love, Live Plants, Gift For Her, Gifts For Him, Happy Planner, Life Planner,Aloha Shirt,Shirts With Sayings
results.description:
Dear Customer,

Due to Corona-Virus situation:

- the shipping and producing time of some ordered items can be longer,
- some of color/size combo can be out of stock temporarily. 

If you will have any questions, please contact us!

Thank you for your understanding!
_____________________________________________________________

Live Forever T Shirt, Live Laugh Love, Live Plants, Gift For Her, Gifts For Him, Happy Planner, Life Planner, Aloha Shirt, Shirts With Sayings,

This  ♥♥♥Live Forever♥♥♥ super soft 100% cotton T-shirt with a unique custom design is your PERFECT shirt for YOU. We proudly use high-quality materials and only high-quality print. Wear it with jeans or your trendy shorts. You really will LOVE it, and never want to take it off! ♥♥♥

♥---DESIGN ---♥
This UNISEX Bella & Canvas T-shirt is made with premium quality knit cotton jersey for both men and women. Superior Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, unisex sizing, shoulder taping, and short sleeves features. A modern unisex fitted shirt, this style features a crew neck and contoured side seams for a stylish trendy t-shirt. Fabrication: 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz.

♥---SIZING ---♥
Unisex shirt with variety of colors and sizes.
The sizes are looser and longer than a typical woman tees. So we recommend to order one size down for women for fitted look. (Please make sure to measure yourself well before give the order. Thank you.)

Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

Chest / Full Body Length Chart:
-> X-SMALL: 17" Chest x 28" Length
-> SMALL: 18" Chest x 28" Length
-> MEDIUM: 20" Chest x 29" Length
-> LARGE: 22" Chest x 30" Length
-> X-LARGE: 24" Chest x 31" Length
-> 2X-LARGE: 26" Chest x 32" Length
-> 3X-LARGE: 28" Chest x 33" Length

* Disclaimer: Please note that the above sizing chart is subject to change.

♥---CARE - INSTRUCTION ---♥ 
Follow these care instructions to enjoy long-term your T-shirt and its custom design.
Machine wash cold, inside-out, gentle cycle with mild detergent and similar colors. Use non-chlorine bleach, only when necessary. No fabric softeners. Tumble dry low or hang-dry for longest life. Cool iron inside-out if necessary. Do not iron decoration. Do not dry clean.


♥---HOW TO ORDER---♥
  1. Choose your RIGHT SIZE from the drop-down menu.
  2. Choose the QUANTITY of your order from the drop-down menu.
  3. Hit the button "ADD TO CART".
  4. Let us know all info for your order in the "Notes to seller" section by checkout.
  5. That's it!
  6. We will let you know about your order and shipping details.


♥---SHIPPING INFO---♥
Please make sure your address on file with Etsy is up to date. The BesteeShop will not be responsible for any outdated or incorrect shipping information provided. Your order will be fine for shipping in 6-10 business days in the US. Please allow 5-8 additional business days for delivery from the USPS/DHL when shipping within the United States. Shipping time to Canada 10-15  business days, international shipping (out of the US and Canada) takes 15-30 business days.


♥--- I M P O R T A N T - I N F O ---♥

** Every tee is made to order. It takes a few days before being able to ship. 
** Colors may vary slightly from monitor to printed product. This can be due to different monitor settings used and the nature of handcrafted products.
** Please make sure your shipping address is correct PRIOR to check out as this can not be changed afterward. BesteeShop is NOT responsible for shipping addresses that are not correct.
** No refunds or exchanges due to ordering the wrong size. Please refer to the size chart. ** 
** Made in the U.S.A.

If you have any questions please feel to free contact us through the 'Contact shop owner' button. Do not hesitate to let us know everything you need prior to ordering.

Designs by ©BesteeShop. @ BESTEESHOP 2020   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
